name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-sharepoint-tab-request-approval-csharp
title: Send task approvals using activity feed notifications (Graph API) and store them using SharePoint Embedded
shortDescription: This sample shows a feature where the requester can request for any task approval from manager and the manager can see the pending request by user on the click of activity feed notification and can approve or reject the request. The data is stored using SharePoint respository service.
longDescription: This sample shows a feature where the requester can request for any task approval from manager and the manager can see the pending request by user on the click of activity feed notification and can approve or reject the request. The data is stored using SharePoint respository service.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing send task approvals using activity feed notification (graph apis) and SharePoint respository service for storage.

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
